resources.string: All the financial institutes owned by our rich bunny have overcome the crisis and are rolling in cash once again. Of course this means huge bonuses for our bunny. The men carrying suitcases full of money are already on their way to bunny\'s home. Stop them to spare him even bigger wealth!

In this tower-defense-style level you have to arm bunny\'s front yard to blast those no good money carrying bastards back to where they came from. Spend as much money as possible on modern high-tech home security systems to stop your minions from reaching your doorstep. But beware: they are determined to hand you your hard earned bonuses and they are coming prepared.

The game is played from a bird\'s eye view. Enemies approach from the left side of the screen and try to reach the door on the right. The lawn in the middle can be equipped with various defense mechanisms that can be selected from the menu. All you have to do is place and maintain those devices, they handle the "rest". The game\'s goal is to stop as many money carriers as possible from reaching your house before the counter is running out.

Our poor unlucky bunny, desperately trying to get rid of its heavy burden, also won a lottery. And now the money is delivered! Try to defend yourself from the delivering persons by the use of hired guns, which will shoot them with carrots, potatoes ...
 
 Availabe Mercenaries:
Basic cheap mercenary, only small damage and medium shooting rate.
Better but more expensive ex-soldier. slow projectiles, but good damage and shooting rate. 5 projectiles per volley.
Elite Mercenary fighting with massive power, medium damage bullets but high shooting rate and high bullet velocity.
Specialized tower, freezes enemy to half speed. No damals, slow bullets.
